english tesse.question: मैं हर सुबह नहाता हूँ।
english tesse.answer: I take a bath every morning.
english tesse.note: Use present simple tense for habits.

english tesse.question: वह सुबह योग करती है।
english tesse.answer: She does yoga in the morning.
english tesse.note: Third person singular - add 's' to verb.
